isis.stitle: TSI 04-12-09 - Releasing Front Cover PTO Adaptation Kit.

subjectgroup.subject: Releasing Front Cover PTO Adaptation Kit.

geninfo.para: This TSI announces the release of the Front Cover Power Take-off (PTO) Adaptation Kit (Part No. 1842537C91). The kit contains all the parts necessary to connect the PTO device to the engine gear train at the air compressor drive gear.
This feature may be used alone or in combination with any other auxiliary PTO options available through your International® dealer.

note.para: Use of this kit requires the engine already be equipped with the front cover PTO option. To verify if an engine has this option, determine if the front cover has a separate A-flange cover plate, which provides access to the air compressor drive gear. If the A-flange cover plate exists, the engine has the PTO option and is configured correctly for use of this Front Cover PTO Adaptation kit.

geninfo.para: When an engine is ordered with the PTO option, the engine comes equipped as follows:

item.para: A front cover (front half) with a standard SAE A-flange cover plate, located opposite the air compressor.
An internally splined air compressor drive gear.
